block.p: Christie Ann Chan, a daughter of Agnes and Bing Chan of Stony Brook, N.Y., and Thomas Hunt Belknap Jr., the son of Alice and Thomas Belknap of Wenham, Mass., are to be married this evening at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Ignatius Loyola in New York. Christie Ann Chan, a daughter of Agnes and Bing Chan of Stony Brook, N.Y., and Thomas Hunt Belknap Jr., the son of Alice and Thomas Belknap of Wenham, Mass., are to be married this evening at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Ignatius Loyola in New York. Deacon Stephen Katsouros is to perform the ceremony.
The couple are associates at New York law firms, she with McDermott, Will & Emery, he with Healy & Baillie. They received law degrees from Emory University.

The bride, 27, graduated cum laude from the University of Pennsylvania. Her father retired as an aeronautical engineer at Brookhaven (N.Y.) National Laboratory. Her mother is a hematologist at the Veterans Administration Hospital in Northport, N.Y.
The bridegroom, 29, graduated from Tufts University. His father is a partner in Hill & Barlow, the Boston law firm.
